sentence.Network_en: But every time I try a meatless supper on the family, there are howls of rebellion.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是每当我在家试着做一顿无肉饭菜时, 就会引起反抗的吼声.

sentence.Network_en: These meatless products are high in protein, low in fat , and, more importantly, they taste good!
sentence.Network_cn: 这些素料有高蛋白质, 低脂肪, 更重要的是, 它们味道很棒!
